aboutUs.title: Our Craft, Your Table
aboutUs.paragraph1: For three generations, Tranj has proudly served Varna and the surrounding region with premium-quality pork. As a locally rooted butcher shop, we are committed to offering meats from trusted regional providers who share our dedication to freshness, safety, and exceptional standards.
aboutUs.paragraph2: Every cut we offer is hand-selected and expertly prepared by our skilled butchers, ensuring rich flavor and reliable quality for every meal. From classic pork chops and tender roasts to specialty cuts and traditional Bulgarian favorites, we deliver products that meet the needs of families, home cooks, and professional chefs alike.
